verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H7231>multiply<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth,<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> unto them,

That the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H2007>they<s%> were <S%H2896>fair;<s%> and they <S%H3947>took<s%> them <S%H802>wives<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H977>chose.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H7307>spirit<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5769>always<s%> <S%H1777>strive<s%> with <S%H120>man,<s%> for that <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H7945>also<s%> <S%H1571><s%> is <S%H1320>flesh:<s%> yet his <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

There <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H5303>giants<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651>that,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> and they <S%H3205>bore<s%> children to them, the <S%H1992>same<s%> became mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were of <S%H4480>old,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H8034>renown.<s%>

And <S%H3068>GOD<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> was <S%H7227>great<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and that <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3336>imagination<s%> of the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H7535>only<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3605>continually.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

And it <S%H5162>repented<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> he had <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H120>man<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and it <S%H6087>grieved<s%> him <S%H413>at<s%> his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H4229>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I have <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth;<s%> both <S%H4480>man,<s%> <S%H120><s%> <S%H5704>and<s%> <S%H929>beast,<s%> <S%H5704>and<s%> the creeping <S%H7431>thing,<s%> <S%H5704>and<s%> the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>air;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> it <S%H5162>repenteth<s%> me <S%H3588>that<s%> I have <S%H6213>made<s%> them.
But <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah:<s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H6662>just<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H8549>perfect<s%> in his <S%H1755>generations,<s%> and <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>
And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8035>Shem,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth.<s%>
The <S%H776>earth<s%> also was <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2555>violence.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> looked <S%H7200>upon<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it was <S%H7843>corrupt;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> had <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> The <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me; <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2555>violence<s%> through <S%H4480>them;<s%> <S%H6440><s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H7843>destroy<s%> them <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Make <S%H6213><s%> thee an <S%H8392>ark<s%> of <S%H1613>gopher<s%> <S%H6086>wood;<s%> <S%H7064>rooms<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> in the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> and shalt <S%H3722>pitch<s%> it <S%H4480>within<s%> <S%H1004><s%> and <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H2351><s%> with <S%H3724>pitch.<s%>

And <S%H2088>this<s%> is the fashion <S%H834>which<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> it of: The <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H8392>ark<s%> shall be <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of it <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H6967>height<s%> of it <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

A <S%H6672>window<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> to the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> and <S%H413>in<s%> a <S%H520>cubit<s%> shalt thou <S%H3615>finish<s%> it <S%H4480>above;<s%> <S%H4605><s%> and the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H8392>ark<s%> shalt thou <S%H7760>set<s%> in the <S%H6654>side<s%> thereof; with <S%H8482>lower,<s%> <S%H8145>second,<s%> and <S%H7992>third<s%> stories shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> it.

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I, even <S%H589>I,<s%> do <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H3999>flood<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> is the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> from <S%H4480>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> and every <S%H3605>thing<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H1478>die.<s%>

But <S%H854>with<s%> thee will I <S%H6965>establish<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant;<s%> and thou shalt <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> and thy <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and thy <S%H802>wife,<s%> and thy <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee.

And of <S%H4480>every<s%> <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416>thing<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> of <S%H4480>every<s%> <S%H3605><s%> sort shalt thou <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> to keep them <S%H2421>alive<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee; they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> and <S%H5347>female.<s%>

Of <S%H4480>fowls<s%> <S%H5775><s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H929>cattle<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> of <S%H4480>every<s%> <S%H3605><s%> creeping <S%H7431>thing<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> of <S%H4480>every<s%> <S%H3605><s%> sort shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, to keep them <S%H2421>alive.<s%>

And <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> unto thee of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3978>food<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H398>eaten,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H622>gather<s%> it <S%H413>to<s%> thee; and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for <S%H402>food<s%> for thee, and for them.
Thus <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H5146>Noah;<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him, <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> he.
